channel.title: What has happend to the runescape cheeting community? (plz read it all)
channel.description:
(before i ask my question i want to tell you what it was like, seeing all of this happen and colapse, so you can understand my question)
A long time ago after ghostmouse, after autominer, after various bots and things, the runescape cheeting was minimum and nobody thought it would ever stand back on its feet.
Until Kaitnieks came
he posted he was making a scriptable macroer
some believed him some thought it was a hoax
then autorune came out
everyone was so happy
he became famous for bringing runescape cheeting back
then after awhile
runescape figured out how to stop autorune
and cheating was down to minimum again
then kaitnieks made scar!
finaly everyone was able to auto again!
on the kaitnieks forums
cheating was good
everyone was making just enough with scar to have an unfair advantage over the legit players
thats where i came in
my friend told me about scar
i downloaded it and got into runescape cheating
then awhile after that happend then...
you guessed it...
ARYAN...
aryan was possibly the biggest thing to happen to runescape cheating since the dupeing happend
you could auto 24/7 without it messing up
you could use as many accounts as your computer could handle
and the best part is
if runescape banned your accounts
you could just have aryan take abunch of new accounts through tut island!
then get back to cheeting until they banned your level 3's and you make new level 3's
so many noobs came to download aryan
it messed up the runescape economy alot
ess was cheep
iron/coal was cheep
autoers had so much surplus materials they could lower their prices to sell fast and it wouldent matter to them cause they would make sooo much money nomatter how much they sold it for
all the autoers were getting rich
then roumors of a "mass ban" were coming up
noone believed it
until that day...
the day that felt to most autoers like if their best friend just died
i was about to go on runeacape happy with my 15 mill full guthan full dharoks a whip and 2 members autoers with 10k flax each that i autoed the night before
i typed runescape.com
i saw the news on runescape on the front page
'mass ban of autoers'
my heart sank to the floor
i read it and every word i read was like a sharp dagger in the cheast
it said not only were they banning the level 3 autoers THEY BANNED THE MAIN ACCOUNTS!
i played runescape alot
me and all of my friends at school played runescape
i played for years legit on my main account
i had never autoed on my main account NEVER
i was almost level 90
in fact my main was in my training spot
when i heard the news runescape did a mass ban
i tried to tell myselfi wasent one of the ones banned
so i went to world 2
tried logging on my first flax autoer
banned
tried my second flax autoer
banned
i was so scared my heart was beating so fast
when i was typing in my mains username and pass it felt like slow motion
keystroke after keystroke
then i moved the mouse over enter
clicked the mouse
i would have sworn that when i saw what i saw, my heart completly stopped
and what i saw was
'your account is banned'
my main account
my prized posesion
gone
completly and totaly gone
my main was dead
and then i found out
the reason it happend
WAS BECAUSE THE ARYAN TEAM MADE ARYAN HAVE NEGATIVE UID's!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
i hated everyone and quit runescape and quit the runescape cheating community
when i left i didnt think i would be coming back
now i got over what happend
and i missed everyone
so now i am back
aryan is dead
sbot is dead
the only reason scar isnt dead is because SRL
so now i ask you
what has happend?
where is the cheating we used to have
where is the revolution we were creating?
cheating is down just like a long time ago
kaitnieks made autorune and kaitnieks made scar when everyone thought cheating would never come back
kaitnieks was a good leader and never let us down
then regex came with aryan and messed everything up
he made the best bot ever and backstabbed us all by getting most of us banned
some got lucky and didnt get banned from aryan
but most got banned from aryan
as a result of regex's little joke to get us all banned
jagex attacked and put too much of a hassel on kaitnieks to keep the forums up
kaitnieks had a baby on the way and didnt need to be worrying about all this law stuf
we need a new program
we need somthing that jagex cant fight back
we need somthing flawless
we need somthing that will make us all rich and wont have us get stabbed in the back
cheating is down
we need someone like kaitnieks to turn that all around
we need someone to make a revolutionary program and lead us to victory of overthrowing jagex ltd
who will be our new kaitnieks?
who will bring runescape cheating back?
who?

item.title: What has happend to the runescape cheeting community? (plz read it all)
item.dc:creator: @Nerice Nerice
item.description:
@Nerice wrote:

Too many leechers that want stuff handed to them and bitch when they dont get instant satisfaction and you wonder why noone puts out a public java bot?

All I can say, is if Tiaos gives ARGA out for free, you guys better suck it up, shut up, and not bitch. She is about the only hope I see of the public getting a java bot. She is young, and hasnt learned yet what she is headed for.

Read full topic

item.title: What has happend to the runescape cheeting community? (plz read it all)
item.dc:creator: @XxKanexX Kane.
item.description:
@XxKanexX wrote:

[quote=“The Un-Named, post:18, topic:13391”][quote author=Pie 0wnz link=topic=19939.msg225756#msg225756 date=1157705057]

Great story. Tell it at a party.

Get a life.

IMO kait gave us hope; we have no hope, all we have is shitty scar and half shitty srl.
[/quote]

And you fucking wonder why people flame you.

ALOT of people CAN script in scar AND DO A BLOODY GOOD JOB. It’s because of fucking leechers alot of us probally don’t release scripts. Like me. Now I know my past 2 autofighters where pretty shitty but the one I’ve got right now works for hours on end.

Oh, and if SCAR IS shitty, please, make somthing as easy to script and as powerful.[/quote]
Agree’d.

Scar can be as powerful as you make it. Sure, it has it’s limits. But so does everything. Maybe learn some scripting skills, Pie, and you’d be able to understand that.

Read full topic

Oh, and if SCAR IS shitty, please, make somthing as easy to script and as powerful.
